choices: A taste of evil sounds fun
1.content:
Well, who do you want the feet of? A student.
Or how about a hero?
Or, are you feeling risky, or are captured, and want the feet of a villain?
1.title: The start!

11.content: Those hero's in training definitely have been active, and could always use some attention to their feet. But, shall it be a male or female student?
11.title: Students!

111.content: Male student, cool! Let's get some obvious choices out of the way
111.title: Male.

1113.content: How about the firey-ice Todoroki, or class representative Iida
1113.title: Other

11132.content:
Tenya looked at you with a bit of a shocked look on his face as you asked him the sexual question. "Y-you want to see my feet, dear classmate?" he said, his face slowly starting to glow with a pinkish blush. He then looked around at the empty classroom, and got up from his current position and went to close and lock the door. He then looked back at you and gave a reassuring look to you. "Don't worry, dear classmate! I'm just making sure that we are in an environment that is safe to do this in!"

He then went to your desk, which was in front of the class, and sat on the teacher's desk in front of you. He then began to undo the laces on his nice dark-colored shoes, as you then saw his plain colored white socks. He looked at you while he was doing all of this, and couldn't help but be in a bit of awe at your display of affection towards his feet. "If you are curious about the size, they happen to be a size 15 1/2. I hope that they are big enough for you, dear classmate." Tenya said, as hearing the number made you almost go hard.

Slowly but surely, the class representative of Class 1-A, Tenya Iida, had his size 15 1/2 feet out and in the open and they were bare, the pair of socks falling to the floor with a light thud. Immediately, you notice that they do not smell like they've been sweating for a while. The smell is almost like a clean linen sort of smell, Iida's thick toes moving around to give you a bit more of a boner, as he looked at you.

"W-well, dear classmate. What do you want to do with my feet?"
11132.title: Tenya Iida

choices: A fellow classmate knocks on the door, having left something
111322.content:
"Just relax, Iida. I will make your feet feel good"

You said with a warm smile, a wild blush on your cheeks as your class representative presented his huge feet for you. He was kind enough to give them to you, it was only right for you to make him feel good as well. You gently grasped those ankles and lifted both of his feet up in front of you.

Those long, smooth soles greeted your sight, and you couldn't help but stare in shock and awe. For someone who's quirk was running fast, you were damn sure surprised to see just how well kept Iida's feet looked. Those thick toes were idly moving as he watched you inspect his feet. Iida had a blush as big as your own, but gave a nod down to you as he watched curiously "Enjoy yourself, dear classmate. You've been working hard as well!"

With those final words of approval, you let yourself give in. The sight of those smooth long soft soles and thick toes had you hard as a rock, though you ignored it for now. Gently guiding those feet down onto your face, both soles completely enveloping it. A shaky sigh escaping your lips at the initial contact of being surrounded by those large feet. Holding those large feet up for your classmate, you slid your tongue out, turned your head slightly, and gave the first lick along his right sole. Just as a test drive for both of you. When you didn't hear any sort of sign to stop, you gave another small lick to that same sole. Followed by another, and another.

After a few, you finally heard Iida make a noise. A low moan coming from him, and that only spurred you on. Those feet were driving you wild, and you wanted to drive your classmate wild as well. Head turning again so that tongue could glide along the other long sole covering your face. Feeling like you had died and gone to heaven under those soles. His toes wiggled in your hair, clearly enjoying the attention you were lavishing on his soles.

Wanting to see how he was doing, you paused and lowered those feet a bit. His thick long digits just inches from your mouth as you gazed up to him. He was staring down at you, smiling wide and clearly enjoying himself as well. At least, judging by the large bulge in his pants he was sporting. Seeing how he was loving it just as much as you, you tried to decide on what to do next.
111322.title: Lick them

112.content: How about these two popular students?
112.title: Female.

1122.content:
Yaoyorozu was tired. It made sense she would be with all the rigorous training going on at UA. Between mister Aizawa and All-Might, rest was a luxury. Both were extremely devoted to their students and made sure that they worked hard to push them forward. Quirk exercises and combat training were par for the course.

Momo was no stranger to hard work but she was still human. Her body ached from the workload, especially her feet. Running and jumping in those tight red boots really did a number on her heels, soles and toes. Walking only confirmed how sore she really was.

Currently it was lunch time at UA high and Yaoyorozu decided she would enjoy her lunch alone on the roof. Truthfully she didn't want anyone to see how much pain she was in. She was Class 1-A's vice representative after all, she needed to look strong for them.

Still, it didn't change the fact that pain was pain. Even though she was out of those boots and in her standard school shoes, her feet still ached. It was a nightmare. Managing the stairs alone proved to be a challenge. Not to mention it took all her strength not to yelp in pain when she was forced to dodge that pervert, Mineta who tried to sneak up on her.

"I seriously have to remember to report him one day." she sighed. Momo finally had some reprieve when she took a seat on a small box she created with her Quirk. Never before had she felt so blessed to have a creation quirk. Still, she had to open her shirt to make it.

"It's a good thing no else is up here." she said to herself. It also helped that there were no cameras were she was and nobody could see her from the windows of the school. She had found the perfect blind spot. Seeing as she was all alone anyway, she gently removed her shoes.

Yaoyorozu sighed in relief as some of the extra pressure on her feet was released. "Much better." she smiled. Still, she wanted her feet to actually breath so the socks were the next thing to go. The cool breeze felt magnificent. The pain was still there, but far less so.

Momo Yaoyorozu, Class 1-A vice representative finally felt relaxed. She turned to her side and picked up the lunch bag her butler had prepared for her before she left. She was pleased to see he had prepared a nice and simple salad. It was a welcome change from all the fish dishes she'd been eating last week.

Momo took another moment to enjoy the breeze before digging in. Right as she was about to take her first bite the sound of the rooftops door caught her attention.

That couldn't be right, the roof was off limits! That's what made this spot so ideal! Not only that she wasn't decent! She immediately turned her head and saw...
1122.title: Momo Yaoyorozu

11221.content:
Momo's face caught fire as she saw who was standing there in the doorway. That mop of green hair, those emerald orbs, and that freckled face. It could be none other than Class 1-A's own Izuku Midoriya. Yaoyorozu didn't know the boy very well but she id respect him. His drive and work ethic alone demanded it. But what was he doing here? Did he fallow her.

Her guess wasn't far off as Izuku did fallow her. He was one of the more observant student's in class and he instantly took notice of the pain Yaoyorozu tried to hide. He'd done so himself when he nearly broke himself doing All-Might's training plan. Because of this and his kind nature he felt compelled to check on his classmate.

The first thing that confused him was when he saw Yaoyorozu head for the roof. She was a stickler for the rules so that was the first red flag. The second came when he saw her struggling to make it up the stairs. It was clear as day to him then that she was in more pain than he thought.

Without a second thought he skipped lunch in favor of fallowing the vice rep to the roof. What he didn't expect was the sight that awaited him. Momo Yaoyorozu with an open shirt and no shoes. Just what was she doing up here? It was probably better that he didn't pursue that train of thought.

He wasn't a pervert. He wasn't Mineta. But even he couldn't turn away from the sight. That long raven hair tied in spiked ponytail, that ample chest, voluptuous figure, pretty feet. He mentally wanted to smack himself. This was just like one of those awkward moments in manga and anime where the main character walks in on an unsuspecting female. If this scenario was fallowing the same logic then...

Yaoyorozu stood up.

Izuku braced himself for pain, but it never came. Instead it was an embarrassed Yaoyorozu holding her shirt closed with a red face. He honestly wasn't expecting that.

"M-Midoriya!? T-This isn't what it looks like!" she frantically explained. Then winced in pain when trying to move. Before she knew it Izuku was in front of her, his face showing nothing but concern.

"Hey? Are you okay?" he asked.

Yaoyorozu wanted to say, yes. Act as if everything was fine. But found she couldn't. She'd been caught red handed. It made no sense to lie. With a heavy sigh she sat back down on her box. "No."

Izuku looked more worried than before. "You're in a lot of pain right now, huh?"

She couldn't hide it anymore. "Yes."

"Do you want me to take you to recovery girl?" he asked.

"No!" she almost shouted. "I-I mean that won't be necessary. It would be a waste of her quick anyhow."

Izuku was surprised by the brief outburst but chose not to comment on it. He didn't know the raven haired beauty all that well but from what he's observed she seemed to be a very calm and in control kind of person. He never heard her raise her voice at anyone except Mineta.

"Why don't you want to see recovery girl? I'm sure she wouldn't mind taking a look at you." Izuku tried to reason.

Yaoyaorzu shook her head. She couldn't go see recovery girl. She needed to look strong for the rest of Class 1-A. Going down to see the medic would do her no favors. Some people in the class actually look up to her, she couldn't let them down. Getting treatment from Recovery girl when not training was a no go.

"I can't." she whispered.

Izuku felt himself sigh. She wouldn't be persuaded by anything he said. For whatever reason, Yaoyorozu didn't want to see recovery girl and it was obvious to him that she needed to. He wanted to be a hero, and a hero saves people with a smile on their face. The two sat in silence while Izuku contemplated what his idol would do.

Then it struck him.

"Where does it hurt?"

"Huh?" was Momo's brilliant reply.

"Where does it hurt?" Izuku asked again.

Yaoyorozu didn't know where Izuku was going with this but answered non the less. "My whole body hurts actually, but my feet are killing me the most. Just walking around is hard to do."

Izuku understood. It definitely explained why she didn't have her shoes and socks on. If she allowed it, he knew one thing that might help alleviate some of the pain.

"I think I know something that might help you" Izuku stated.

Momo looked intrigued. "What do you have in mind?"

Izuku gulped before now looking nervous. "A-A massage."

Momo's eyes bulged.
11221.title: Izuku Midoriya

112211.content:
A massage? Admittedly the idea of a massage sounded quite nice. She had massages before from her personal masseuse at home but this was different. This was a student in her class who offered. Not only that, again, she didn't know him very well. She eyed him closely, making sure to take in every little detail.

He was nervous, but not in a perverse kind of way. He seemed genuine in his desire to help her. That was surprising since most people gave her looks of lust which disgusted her. Mineta being the most guilty party. Yaoyorozu thought about turning down the green haired boy's offer, but based on the pain she was in it seemed like she would need it.

"A-Alright. But just my feet." she said nervously. Midoriya might be earnest but she didn't trust him with his hands all over her.

Izuku was slightly surprised she agreed to his offer, he half expected her to kindly decline. Well, at least he now had the chance to help her. He gave her a bright smile before taking a seat in front of her. The smile mostly served to hide just how nervous he really was.

"O-Okay." Izuku said to himself. Now that he was up close to her feet he saw just how beautiful they were. It was as if they were cut from diamond and those perfectly manicured nails. There was slight bruising around the sole but that was to be expected. She was in pain after all. There was also a slight smell from her combat training in those boots.

Izuku ignored that last part and found himself starting to sweat. He was in such a rush to help a person in need that he'd completely forgotten he's never given a massage to a girl before. He didn't count his mom. That was different.

Izuku felt his hands start to shake as he reached for Yaoyorozu's foot. The moment his hands made contact his eyes widened as big as saucers. He had never in his life felt anything so soft. Yaoyorozu's feet were even softer than the All-Might sheets he had at home.

Yaoyorozu gave a small moan at the contact. Izuku's hands were so warm and comfortable. What kind of kin care products did he use. Human hands weren't supposed to be that soft. Not only that his grip was beyond gentle. He took extra care in making sure he caused her no discomfort.

Izuku must've heard her moan of contentment because his face was as red as a tomato. He really needed to get more confidence. Figuring he observed her long enough, he began to massage her foot. At first Momo grunted in slight discomfort, but soon discomfort turned into relief.

The pain she was feeling started to ebb away as Izuku massaged her toes. He made sure to give each and every digit special attention. He made sure to really get in there and even gave gentle squeezes in between her toes. Momo really liked that.

The emerald haired by was surprised by good this was going and even more so by how clean it was in between Yaoyorozu's toes. Not even the slightest speck of dirt. There was the occasional lint from her socks but that was about it.

Izuku began to feel a little hot under the collar as when he saw Yaoyorozu let go of her shirt and he saw her large bust comfortably contained in her jet black bra. He fought hard not to stare, constantly reminding himself he wasn't the grape mutant of Class 1-A.

Once he was done with the toes he made his way to the soles. He made sure to take great care around the bruising. He didn't want to make Momo's pain any worse. Up above, Momo felt herself leaning back from the pleasure she was feeling from Izuku's hands. She unconsciously created another box to lie back on as Izuku continued his work. Before she even realized it, she slipped a hand under her bra.

Izuku massaged and rubbed the sole gently and marveled at the beauty of it. Once finished he moved on to the ball of her foot. Izuku never once noticed the tent he was pitching while alleviating Yaoyarozu's pain. He was too enamored with her foot and lost in his work.

Both parties continued blushing and enjoying the other's contact until their session was abruptly cut short. The school bell rang, signaling the end of lunch period.

Both students were freed from whatever spell they were caught in and became aware of their situation. Izuku quickly stood up a noticed the tightness of his pants. Yaoyorozu immediately caught herself with her hand on her chest. Both turned away from each other awkwardly as silence reigned.

"Uh... W-We better get back to class." Izuku reasoned.

"Y-Yes. Just give me a moment." Yaoyorozu blushed. She swiftly put her outfit back together and stood up to find that her feet didn't hurt nearly as much. Izuku's idea had worked.

"M-Midoriya? Where did you learn how to do that?" Momo asked.

"Books." he replied a little to hastily.

Yaoyorozu accepted that as he didn't seem comfortable talking about it. Truthfully both of them were feeling a little uncomfortable right now. What would've happened had the bell not rang.

"Y-Yaoyaorozu. If you're ever feeling in pain let me k-know. I'll help in any way I can." Midoriya said resolutely.

There was that Midoriya determination. She smiled. "Very well. Next time I'm in pain I'll come find you."

"Good."

Both made there way to the rooftop door... And returned to class.
112211.title: Accept the massage

1123.content: How about the big damn froggy stompers of Tsuyu Asui. Or the bodaciously pink footsies of Mina Ashido.
1123.title: Other!

13.content: which villain do you choose?
13.title: A taste of evil sounds fun

info.brief_description: Just you or other characters from the show having a bit of foot fetish fun!
info.description:
Every want to have fun with the feet of characters from the popular anime My Hero Academia? Well here is your chance!

Any and all characters and their feet are up for grabs in this story. You can take control as a hero, villain, or student. Or, make your own!

Both female and male feet are allowed, and both female and males can be dominant, or on the receiving end. Gay, Lesbian, Straight. All relationships are allowed.

Of course, the story is to be foot fetish focused. But that doesn't mean other kinks and sex can't be included. Footjobs are great. Maybe have a custom quirk for you to have? One that involves hypnosis, size change, increase sensitivity of your sense of smell, or someone else's. Just nothing too extreme (Vore, Scat, Death, etc.)
